remarks: Closure of the power series addition operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
statement:
psraddcl.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psraddcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psraddcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
psraddcl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Grp ) $.
psraddcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psraddcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
psraddcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. B ) $.
